title: San Juan National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Zika Virus  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Zika Virus  The Zika virus is a viral disease transmitted to people by infected mosquitoes (Aedes species, a non-native species introduced by humans). This information is compiled to help you prepare for your visit to San Juan National Historic Site. more
